example.eg: I'm surprised you can find anything among all that clutter in your room.
example.egtrans: 你房间里这么乱，能找到东西真是奇迹。

example.eg: Lindsay prefers the tranquility of the countryside to the clutter of the city.
example.egtrans: 比起城市的喧闹，林赛更喜欢乡村的宁静。

example.eg: Don't clutter my desk with your paperwork!
example.egtrans: 把你的文件拿走，不要弄乱了我的桌子！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...弄得乱七八糟, 弄乱...

example.eg: Please take your belongings with you.  You don't need to clutter up my car.
